issue.title: [C++] Reading list from parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7845](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7845). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the Parquet format reader delivered with apache arrow c++ does not support Parquet lists.

See a related issue in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PARQUET-834

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7845?focusedCommentId=17036527) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Can you provide more detail about your report (e.g. a traceback)? I think this is a duplicate of ARROW-1644

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7845?focusedCommentId=17036879) by Mikhail Filimonov (mfilimonov):*
Have no traceback right now.

 You can find some details here: <https://github.com/ClickHouse/ClickHouse/pull/8334>

In general, it's about[ https://github.com/apache/parquet-format/blob/master/LogicalTypes.md#lists](https://github.com/apache/parquet-format/blob/master/LogicalTypes.md#lists)

And yes it looks like a duplicate of ARROW-1644 
I was looking for related issues but didn't find it, so you can close this one.
